response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This allows you to acquire it at a slight discount compared to its value, while also ensuring a fair return for me. Please let me know if this proposal works for you, or if you have any suggestions for a counteroffer.", "product_price": 9500}
